newsitem.title: CHINA: Shanghai Jinqiao to offer dividend.
newsitem.headline: Shanghai Jinqiao to offer dividend.

text.p: Shareholders of Shanghai Jinqiao Export Processing Zone Development Co have approved a pre-tax dividend of 0.10 yuan per share based on the firm's 1996 net profit, a company statement said on Wednesday.
The dividend for B shares will be exchanged for U.S. dollars at an exchange rate of 8.2943 yuan to the dollar, the statement said.
Ex-dividend date for all shares will be June 17, it said.
The company posted a net profit of 102.165 yuan for 1996, sharply up from 58.275 million yuan for 1995, under international accounting standards.
